memberdef.name: toDPI_V
memberdef.initializer: Vec2F {vec.x * currentDPI / BASE_DPI, vec.y * currentDPI / BASE_DPI}

briefdescription.para: Checks if the OS is Mac.
Checks if the OS is Windows.
Checks if the OS is Linux.
Checks if the OS is Mac, Windows or Linux.
Checks if the OS is iOS.
Checks if the OS is Android.
Checks if it is Android or iOS.

memberdef.name: MAKE_CLASS_ITERABLE
memberdef.initializer: public: \ iteratorType::iterator begin() { return iterable.begin(); } \ iteratorType::iterator end() { return iterable.end(); } \ iteratorType::reverse_iterator rbegin() { return iterable.rbegin(); } \ iteratorType::reverse_iterator rend() { return iterable.rend(); } \ iteratorType::const_iterator cbegin() { return iterable.cbegin(); } \ iteratorType::const_iterator cend() { return iterable.cend(); } \ iteratorType::const_reverse_iterator crbegin() { return iterable.crbegin();} \ iteratorType::const_reverse_iterator crend() { return iterable.crend(); } \

briefdescription.para: Makes a class iterable onto some itarable attribute, like a map or a vector.
